definition: to be both a farmer and a scholar/to work the land and also undertake academic studies
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]

sentences.english: I should know more about computers.
sentences.chinese: 我应该了解耕读关于计算机的东西。

sentences.english: The third combination I must say that plowing business combination.
sentences.chinese: 第三个结合我要说的是耕读商相结合。

definition: the Book of Songs 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1] and Classic of Rites 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4]/a cultured well-read person
the Book of Songs 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1] and the Book of History 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
Confucian moral injunctions of fidelity/piety to one's parents, respect to one's older brother, loyalty to one's monarch, faith to one's male friends
tradition or style from the past/old ways/surviving tradition/relic
preparatory literary studies for imperial examination
poetry and pictorial art/work of art combining pictures and poetry
